Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control that you can place a Subscriber Counter on; remove 1 Subscriber counter from this card, and if you do, place 2 Subscriber Counters on that target.
1901299.name: Azuma Ch. P.O.G.

1901304.effect: Each time a Trap effect is activated, place 1 Subscriber Counter on this card immediately after it resolves. You cannot take damage if the amount inflicted to you would be less than N. (N = the number of Subscriber Counters on this card x 100.) Once per turn: You can target up to 2 cards in either GY; shuffle them into the Deck.
1901304.name: Jakky Ch. P.O.G.

1901333.effect: A member of the popular digital band, Pause On Gold. They seemed to get big out of nowhere, but now that they're here, they're not leaving any time soon.
1901333.name: Xian Ch. P.O.G.
1901333.pendulum_effect: Each time a monster(s) is Summoned, place 1 Subscriber Counter on this card for each. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up card you control that you can place a Subscriber Counter on; remove as many Subscriber Counters from this card as possible, and if you do, place up to that many Subscriber Counters on that card.

1901350.effect: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, remove 2 Subscriber Counters from face-up cards you control. If you cannot, destroy this card. When this card is activated: You can add 1 "P.O.G." monster or Trap from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster you control with an effect that is activated "Once per turn"; you can activate that monster's effect as a Quick Effect (during the Main Phase only) until the end of the next turn. You can only activate 1 "P.O.G. in the Chat" per turn.
1901350.name: P.O.G. in the Chat

1901385.effect:
All monsters you control gain 200 ATK/DEF. Once per turn: You can remove any number of Subscriber Counters from face-up cards you control; apply 1 of the following effects, depending on the number removed.
●1-3: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.
●4-6: Draw 1 card.
●7-9: Banish 1 monster on the field.
●10+: All of the above, in sequence.
1901385.name: P.O.G. Album Art

1901397.effect: If this card was Set last turn: Target 1 card in either GY; banish it. During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can target 1 face-up card you control with a Subscriber Counter on it; remove 2 Subscriber Counters from that target, and if you do, Set this card. You can only activate 1 "P.O.G. Social Media" per turn.
1901397.name: P.O.G. Social Media

1901404.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "P.O.G." Spell from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster you control with an effect that is activated "Once per turn"; if it is a "P.O.G." monster, it cannot be destroyed during this Phase, except by battle. Otherwise, that target cannot be destroyed by battle this turn. You can only activate 1 "P.O.G. on the Road" per turn.
1901404.name: P.O.G. on the Road

1901416.effect:
All monsters your opponent controls lose 200 ATK/DEF. Once per turn: You can remove any number of Subscriber Counters from face-up cards you control; apply 1 of the following effects, depending on the number removed.
●1-3: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 monster.
●4-6: Special Summon 1 monster from your GY. 
●7-9: Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck.
●10+: All of the above, in sequence.
1901416.name: P.O.G. Fanart

1901431.effect: If this card was Set last turn: Target 1 card in either GY; its owner places it on the bottom of their Deck. During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can target 1 face-up card you control with a Subscriber Counter on it; remove 2 Subscriber Counters from that target, and if you do, Set this card. You can only activate 1 "P.O.G. Shining Single" per turn.
1901431.name: P.O.G. Shining Single

1901469.effect:
2 Level 4 monsters with different Types/Attributes
If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can yell "We are Pause On Gold!". If you do, while this card is face-up on the field, you can use the effects of monsters with an effect that activates "Once per turn" up to twice per turn instead. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; place 1 Hater Counter on it. (Cards with Hater Counters on them cannot activate their effects.) While you control a card with a Subscriber Counter on it, the ATK/DEF of monsters with Hater Counters become 0.
1901469.name: Pause On Gold
